author: crafterm
msg: Patch allows you to specify a default activation policy for all components
inside of Fortress, by specifying the 'activation' attribute to the root
level element in the configuration file passed to Fortress during startup.
If no default is specified, 'background' (the previous default) is used.

author: rgardler
msg: correct instructions for viewing local documentation (thanks to Charles Palmer)

author: felicity
msg: found more cases where the message parser would do the wrong thing wrt missing header/body separator.  built out the test a bit more, redid the header parsing routine a bit to deal with all of it.  moved the mbox/mbx separator bit out of the loop since it should only ever hit on the first message line.

author: crafterm
msg: Adds extra startup/shutdown information regarding component dependencies
